definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: :112 throw, fling, cast (Ph. [[שלד]] in cp. n. pr., meaning dub.; Ar. 4lat. is travel (or cause to travel) along a road, cause to enter);—Pf. 3 ms. [[הִשְׁלִיח]] Am 8:3 +; 2 ms. sf. consec. [[וְהִשְׁלַכְּ תִּוֹ]] Je 51:63; 2 fpl. consec. [[וְהִשְׁלַכְתֶּ֫נׇה]] Am 4:3, etc.; Impf. [[יַשְׁלִיח]] Is 2:20, [[וַיַּשְׁלֵח]] Ju Jdg 9:17 +, etc.; Imv. ms. [[הַשְׁלֵח]] Ex 7:9 Ps 55:23, fs. [[הַשְׁלִיכִי]] Je 7:29, etc.; Inf. abs. [[הַשְׁלֵח]] Je 22:19, Je 36:23; cstr. [[הַשְׁלִיח]] Ec 3:5, Ec 3:6, etc.; Pt. [[מֵשְׁלְיח]] Mic 2:5, Ps 147:17, etc.;—
usu. human subj., throw, cast:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: acc. rei, with many prep.: e.g. [[אָל]] loc. 2Ki 23:12, Ez Eze 5:4, Zec 5:8, Zec 5:8 +, also (acc. rei om.) Ex 15:25 (J), Nu 19:6 (P) +; [[ב]] loc, Ex 32:24 (E), Ez Eze 7:19 +; rarely [[ל]] loc. 2Ch 30:14 and (acc. om.) 2Ch 24:10; [[עַל]] loc. 2Ki 23:6, [[הָ֠]] loc. Ex 4:3, Ex 4:3, [[שָׁ֫מָּה]] Ju Jdg 8:25, 2Ki 6:6 (acc. om.), etc.; esp. of casting dead bodies, [[אֶל]] loc. Jos 8:29 (J), Jos 10:27 (J), + 3 t., [[ב]] loc. Am 8:3, 2Ki 9:25, 2Ki 9:26, 2Ki 13:21, [[מֵהָֽלְאָה לְ]] Je 22:19; acc. rei + [[אֶל]] pers. 1Ki 19:19, 2Sa 20:22 (acc. om.); acc. rei c. [[עַל]] pers. Na 3:6, Ju Jdg 9:53, 2Sa 11:21 ( + [[מֵעַל]]), etc.; acc. rei + [[מִיׇּד]] Ex 32:19 (E), cf. De 9:17 ([[מֵעַל]]); + [[ל]] of animal Ex 22:30 (E), Is 2:20, etc. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. acc. pers., [[אֶל]] of pit Ge 37:22 (E), Je 38:6, Je 38:9, [[ב]] of pit Ge 37:20 (E), c. [[ה]] loc. v:Ge 37:24 (E; pit), Ex 1:22 (J), cf. Am 4:3 (si vera 1.); [[תַּחַת]] loc. Ge 21:15 (E); acc. ´[[י]]:, fig., c. [[אַחֲרֵי גַוֶּךָָ]] 1Ki 14:9 (of apostasy), Ez Eze 23:35, so ´[[י]]:’s law Ne 9:26, words ([[אַחֲרֵי]] pers. reflex.) Ps 50:17. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: throw away, acc. rei Ju Jdg 15:17 ([[מִיׇּדוֹ]]), 2Ki 7:15, Ez Eze 20:7, Eze 20:8, Ps 2:3 ([[מִן]] reflex.), Ec 3:5 (opp. = [[כָּנַס]]); acc. om. Je 7:29, Joe 1:7 (of locusts); abs. Ec 3:6 (opp. [[שָׁמַר]]); acc. of transgr. Ez Eze 18:31 (fig.; [[מֵעַל]] reflex.). †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: cast off, shed, blossom (like flower) Job 15:33.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: cast down (late), subj. goat, acc. ram, Da 8:7 ([[אַ֫רְחָה]]) little horn, acc. [[אֱמֶת]] v:Da 8:12 (id.); acc. pers. (lit.) 2Ch 25:12 ([[מִן]] loc.), Job 18:7 his (own) counsel felleth him; so prob. Je 9:18 they have overthrown our dwellings (Du reads Hoph.).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: fig., Ps 55:23 cast ´[[על־י]]: thy lot.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: cast, acc. rei, + [[עַל]] pers. Jos 10:11 (E), Job 27:22 (acc. rei om.); sandal upon Edom Ps 60:10 = Ps 108:10 (sign of possession); ice (no prep.) Ps 147:17.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: acc. pers. + [[ב]] loc. 2Ki 2:16 (subj. ´[[רוּחַ י]]:), Ne 9:11, Jon 2:4 ( + acc. loc.); + [[אַ֫רְחָה]] Ez Eze 28:17 (fig.); [[אֶל]] loc. (of exile) De 29:27; esp. of ´[[י]]:’s rejecting men, acc. pers. + [[מֵעַל פָּנׇיו]] 2Ki 13:23, 2Ki 24:20, cf. 2Ki 17:20, Je 7:15, Je 7:15, Je 52:3, also Ps 51:13 and (without [[מִן]]) Ps 71:9; casting sins (acc.) [[אַחֲרֵי גֵּוְךָ]] Is 38:17, [[ב]] loc. Mic 7:19.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: cast down, honour of Israel + acc. loc., [[מִן]] loc., La 2:1; acc. pers. Ps 102:11 (opp. [[נׇשָׂא]]).
